name: @opensrp/location-management
description: Location management components for opensrp web

scripts.test: cd ../../ && jest test  packages/%npm_package_config_folderName% --verbose --collectCoverage=true && cd packages/%npm_package_config_folderName%
scripts.test:watch: cd ../../ && jest test  packages/%npm_package_config_folderName% --verbose --watch && cd packages/%npm_package_config_folderName%
scripts.build: yarn run tsc && yarn run transpile && yarn run copy
scripts.add-package: yarn run tsc && yarn run transpile:windows && yarn run copy && cd ../../client && yarn add file:../packages/%npm_package_config_folderName% && yarn start

author: OpenSRP Engineering
